General.Name: Al Kathiri Holding Co
General.Description: Al Kathiri Holding Company manufactures, distributes, and transports cement and ready-made concrete to construction and real estate development companies in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It also distributes construction materials, such as gravel and various types of sand. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Prince Yazid Ibn Abdullah Ibn Abdulrahma, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 13523
